positive_examples: This is an example of threat assessment.
The threat assessment demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed threat assessment in this context.
A typical case of threat assessment would involve these features.
The concept of threat assessment applies here.
A security operation involving the evaluation and analysis of potential risks or dangers to determine appropriate response measures.
negative_examples: This is an example of security patrol, not threat assessment.
This represents security operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SecurityPatrol, or other types of SecurityOperation

definition: A systematic evaluation of potential dangers and their likelihood of causing harm.
